channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Curam SPM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Curam SPM

item.title: CVE-2020-4779|2024-09-16T20:12:01.163Z -- ibm -- curam%20spm
item.description: A HTTP Verb Tampering vulnerability may impact IBM Curam Social Program Management 7.0.9 and 7.0.10. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security access controls. IBM X-Force ID: 189156.

item.title: CVE-2020-4942|2024-09-16T21:56:52.515Z -- ibm -- curam%20spm
item.description: IBM Curam Social Program Management 7.0.9 and 7.0.11 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 191942.

item.title: CVE-2020-4774|2024-09-16T19:14:08.886Z -- ibm -- curam%20spm
item.description: An XPath vulnerability may impact IBM Curam Social Program Management 7.0.9 and 7.0.10, caused by the improper handling of user-supplied input. By sending a specially-crafted input, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain unauthorized access or reveal sensitive information such as XML document structure and content. IBM X-Force ID: 189152.

item.title: CVE-2020-4772|2024-09-16T16:58:38.130Z -- ibm -- curam%20spm
item.description: An XML External Entity Injection (XXE) vulnerability may impact IBM Curam Social Program Management 7.0.9 and 7.0.10. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information, denial of service, server side request forgery or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 189150.
